title: Resolve
description: The world of Melissa’ Marr’s New York Times bestselling dark fantasy series Wicked Lovely comes to manga! This is the final book in the three-volume series focusing on Rika, a minor character in Wicked Lovely : formerly a mortal, formerly a Winter Girl, and formerly loved by the Summer King. Hidden away from the concerns of the faery and mortal worlds, Rika has treasured the solitude of the desert. But now a threat imperils her desert home—and as a new romance blossoms, so does Rika's determination to face that threat head-on. The time for hiding is over.
author: Melissa Marr
